snippet: An advertising watchdog group says it told the distributor of 5-Hour Energy years ago that a claim that the drink did not cause a letdown once the effects wore off was unfounded.
abstract: Advertising watchdog group National Advertising Division says it told Living Essentials, distributor of 5-Hour Energy caffeine drink, five years ago that a claim that the drink did not cause a letdown once effects wore off was unfounded; plans to start review that could lead to action against company by Federal Trade Commission.
lead_paragraph: An advertising watchdog group says it told the distributor of 5-Hour Energy years ago that a claim that the drink did not cause a letdown once the effects wore off was unfounded.

headline.seo: 5-Hour Energy’s ‘No Crash Later’ Claim Is Disputed
headline.main: Energy Shot’s  ‘No Crash’ Claim Is Disputed by Watchdog
headline.print_headline: Energy Shot’s Promotion Of ‘No Crash’ Is Disputed
